jhave.server
Class GaigsServer

java.lang.Object
  jhave.server.GaigsServer

public class GaigsServer
extends java.lang.Object

The Gaigs Server listener - waits for a client to connect and creates a new ClientConnection thread when one does, then goes back to listening. The Gaigs Server follows this structure: the GaigsServer listens for incoming client connections. When a client connects, a ClientConnection thread is spawned. The ClientConnection handles all the communication to and from that client. On the local filesystem, we use the following directory structure for all of Gaigs' files: 

 GaigsServer.class
 html_root/cat/*.lis                           category listings
          /uid/uid.{dat,sho,sam,etc}           client-associated files
          /script/prefab-script.{sho,sam,etc}  pre-fabricated scriptfiles
          /doc/algo/*                          algorithm-specific documentation
          /ingen/algo.igs                      input-generator scripts
          /javaapp/algo/*                      standalone Java Applets
          /applet/algo.html                    category applet pages
          exe/algo/algo_dat.{exe,class,jar}    optional data generators
          /algo.{exe,class,jar}                algorithm executables
 







Author:

  
JRE
